solution_line_template: If one intersection has {crosswalks_per_intersection} crosswalks, with {lines_per_crosswalk} lines per crosswalk, there are {lines_per_crosswalk}*{crosswalks_per_intersection} = <<{lines_per_crosswalk}*{crosswalks_per_intersection}={lines_per_intersection}>>{lines_per_intersection} lines in all the crosswalks per intersection.

If there are {num_intersections} intersections, the total number of lines in all the intersections is {lines_per_intersection}*{num_intersections} = <<{lines_per_intersection}*{num_intersections}={total_lines}>>{total_lines} lines
